mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recent_click_resume (resume_id, user_name, click_date) VALUES ( #{resumeId}, #{username}, #{clickDate})
mapper.select: SELECT recent_click_resume.resume_id, company_name, job_type, click_date FROM recent_click_resume LEFT JOIN resume ON resume.resume_id = recent_click_resume.resume_id WHERE recent_click_resume.user_name = #{username} ORDER BY click_date DESC

SELECT COUNT( * ) as resume_size, COUNT( if (finish_flag=1 AND pass_flag=1, 1, null)) as pass, COUNT( if (finish_flag=1 AND pass_flag=0, 1, null)) as non_pass, COUNT( if (finish_flag=1 AND pass_flag IS NULL, 1, null)) as submit, COUNT( if (finish_flag=0 AND pass_flag IS NULL, 1, null)) as non_submit FROM resume;
